modules.title: The Kit Bag
modules.description: Gear up with your TON wallet

slides.title: Welcome to the Kit Bag
slides.body: Hey Future Analyst! Before you step onto the pitch to trade predictions, you need your gear.

slides.title: Why Do I Need It?
slides.body: Unlike a bank that holds your money, a Wallet lets YOU hold your money.

slides.title: Quick Check
slides.question: Who controls your crypto wallet?
slides.explanation: That's right! With a crypto wallet, YOU are in control of your funds. No bank or app developer can freeze or take your money.

slides.title: Your Jersey Number
slides.body: We use TON wallets here. Think of your TON Wallet address like your Jersey Number.

slides.title: Let's Suit Up!
slides.instruction: Connect your TON wallet now to finish this Over.

slides.title: OVER COMPLETE!
slides.body: You've got your kit ready! You're now equipped to step onto the pitch.
